title: Climate Activists Throw Mashed Potatoes on Monet Painting
description: The stunt in a German museum was the latest attack on widely admired art, carried out by protesters demanding action on climate change.
dc:creator: Eduardo Medina
media:description: After throwing mashed potatoes at a painting by Claude Monet, on exhibit in Potsdam, Germany, the climate protesters each glued a hand to the wall on Sunday.
